Class TableConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mpa.client.ui.TableConfig

  • public class TableConfig
extends Object
    Helper class for JTable layout functionalities.
    Author:
    Alex Behne

    • Method Detail

      • packColumn

        public static void packColumn(JTable table,
                              int vColIndex,
                              int margin)
        Sets the preferred width of the visible column specified by vColIndex. The column will be just wide enough to show the column head and the widest cell in the column. Margin pixels are added to the left and right resulting in an additional width of 2*margin pixels).
        Parameters:
        table - The JTable object.
        vColIndex - Visible column index.
        margin - The number of margin pixels.

      • clearTable

        public static void clearTable(JTable table)
        This method clears the project table.
        Parameters:
        table - The JTable component.

      • dumpTableToCSV

        public static void dumpTableToCSV(CheckBoxTreeTable treeTbl,
                                  File file)
                           throws IOException
        Dumps the contents of the specified tree table to the specified file in a tab-separated CSV format.
        Parameters:
        treeTbl - the tree table to dump
        file - the file to dump to
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • setColumnMinWidths

        public static void setColumnMinWidths(JTable table,
                                      int padding)
        Automatically determines and sets the minimum widths of a table's columns.
        Parameters:
        table - The table to be adjusted.
        padding - The amount of pixel padding to either side.

      • setColumnMinWidths

        public static void setColumnMinWidths(JTable table,
                                      int leftPadding,
                                      int rightPadding,
                                      Font font)
        Automatically determines and sets the minimum widths of a table's columns.
        Parameters:
        table - The table to be adjusted.
        leftPadding - The amount of left-hand side pixel padding.
        rightPadding - The amount of right-hand side pixel padding.
        font - The used font for FontMetrics object.
